title: Why you may need an outrageous power supply for the RTX 4090 after all
description: Nvidia's board partners are also releasing their own versions of the RTX 4090. Some of these GPUs are calling for outrageous power supply units.

title: Intel and CLX somehow stuffed two PCs inside a single case
description: Intel just teamed up with CLX in order to create a proof-of-concept gaming PC that bundles two desktops into one.
